mapper.select: select * from users where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_img=#{user_img} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT s.uid, s.username, ui.uname, ui.sex, ui.email, ui.signDate, enabled, r.role FROM users s LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON s.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON s.uid=ui.uid
mapper.delete: delete from user_likecomments where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid} and comment_id=#{comment_id}
